about_the_game:
Deeper Than Hell invites you to embark on an online cooperative adventure set in a fantastical world teeming with menacing monsters. This action-packed roguelike platformer challenges players to explore the forgotten temple, the gateway to an ominous path leading deeper than hell, rumored to safeguard an unimaginable treasure. While a handful of brave adventurers have ventured forth, none have returned, heightening the mystery and allure of the unexplored abyss.

Key Features:


  • Online Co-op:
Join forces with up to four players in a cooperative online experience through Steam. Team up, strategize, and face the perilous challenges together.

  • Procedural Generation:
Immerse yourself in a dynamic gaming experience with procedurally generated levels. Each playthrough offers a unique and unpredictable journey, ensuring endless replayability and countless hours of thrilling gameplay.

  • Enchanted Items:
Discover an array of magical items that bestow powerful enchantments and game-changing abilities upon your character. Equip yourself with these mystical artifacts to enhance your strength and overcome the formidable adversaries that lurk in the shadows.

Embark on an epic quest, explore the treacherous depths, and unravel the secrets hidden deeper than hell. Will you and your companions emerge victorious, or will the depths of the abyss claim you like those who came before? The journey awaits, and the legendary treasure beckons to those bold enough to seek it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4005U @ 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9400M
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Deeper Than Hell is an action roguelike for 1-4 players where you play as mysterious mage, driven by the legend of a great treasure, he goes deeper and deeper to find the legendary treasure. Wield weapons & accessories, build synergies and find out what lies deeper than hell.
